An AQF level 3 Arborist (Practising Arborist) is not qualified to write reports under Australian standards for education in the tree industry. You will also find that persons with University qualifications such as Hort science degree or a degree in Arboriculture may write reports. Report writing is a specialised profession carried out by trained professionals meeting the above requirements and experience in the tree industry.\r\n<h5></h5>\r\n<h3 class=\"widget-title\">Who We Are?</h3>\r\n<h5><span style=\"color: #16d116;\">ï¿½</span><b>CANOPY TREE PTY LTD</b></h5>\r\nCanopy Tree PL has been servicing the greater Sydney and Macarthur areas for 16 years. The business is locally owned and operated, which enables us to offer high quality Tree work, tree care &amp; consultancy with practical and safe outcomes. The owner is a member of Arboriculture Australia and the International Society of Arboriculture keeping up to date with industry news and standards. Nicholas is still an active tree climber in the business with an education, wide experience of trees and over twenty years in the industry.\r\n<h5><span style=\"color: #fcc71f;\">ï¿½</span><b>OUR AIM</b></h5>\r\nCanopy Tree Pty Ltd aims to provide superior standards of tree maintenance, conservation, service and education through dedication, commitment and purpose in all aspects of the amenity tree industry. All work is conducted to the Australian Standard Pruning of Amenity Trees AS4373-2007 and to the current code of practice put out by Work Cover for the Amenity Tree Industryï¿½1998.\r\n<h5><span style=\"color: #fcc71f;\">ï¿½</span></h5>\r\n<h3 class=\"widget-title\">Tree Services</h3>\r\n<a class=\"page-box__picture\" href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/our-services/tree-pruning/\"><img class=\"attachment-page-box wp-post-image\" src=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/2-360x240.png\" alt=\"2\" width=\"360\" height=\"240\" /></a>\r\n<h5 class=\"page-box__title  text-uppercase\"><a href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/our-services/tree-pruning/\">Tree Pruning</a></h5>\r\nThe process carried out by utilising all the above methods on a small scale when pruning young newly planted trees, small ornamental trees, small street trees, trees under service lines or power lines. These are some of the many pruning tasks we are asked to carry out at Canopy Tree for our clients.\r\n\r\n<a class=\"read-more  read-more--page-box\" href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/our-services/tree-pruning/\">Read more</a>\r\n\r\n<a class=\"page-box__picture\" href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/our-services/tree-removal/\"><img class=\"attachment-page-box wp-post-image\" src=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/452-685x1024-360x240.jpg\" alt=\"452-685x1024\" width=\"360\" height=\"240\" /></a>\r\n<h5 class=\"page-box__title  text-uppercase\"><a href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/our-services/tree-removal/\">Tree Removal</a></h5>\r\nThe process of removing a tree/palm from its standing form to ground level. At Canopy Tree we do remove trees if it is justified and the permission is granted from your local council. Having over two decades of experience between us we can say that all trees are a challenge and no one tree is the same but you can be confident we will be safe though full caring and only leave you a memory when it is gone.\r\n\r\n<a class=\"read-more  read-more--page-box\" href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/our-services/tree-removal/\">Read more</a>\r\n\r\n<a class=\"page-box__picture\" href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/wood-chip-and-leaf-mulch-suppliers/\"><img class=\"attachment-page-box wp-post-image\" src=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/12-360x240.png\" alt=\"12\" width=\"360\" height=\"240\" /></a>\r\n<h5 class=\"page-box__title  text-uppercase\"><a href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/wood-chip-and-leaf-mulch-suppliers/\">Wood Chip and Leaf Mulch Suppliers</a></h5>\r\n<a class=\"read-more  read-more--page-box\" href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/wood-chip-and-leaf-mulch-suppliers/\">Read more</a>\r\n\r\n&nbsp;\r\n<h2 class=\"widget-title\">Testimonials</h2>\r\n<!-- Wrapper for slides -->\r\n<blockquote class=\"testimonial__quote\">We were delighted with the friendliness shown by you and the boys and the technical skills they displayed in cutting, mulching and removal of trees at our home. AQF level 5 Arborist or consulting Arborist as they are known, is qualified to write reports for councils, commercial or private clients. An AQF level 3 Arborist (Practising Arborist) is not qualified to write reports under Australian standards for education in the tree industry. You will also find that persons with University qualifications such as Hort science degree or a degree in Arboriculture may write reports. Report writing is a specialised profession carried out by trained professionals meeting the above requirements and experience in the tree industry. At Canopy Tree PL we can facilitate with providing an AQF level 5 Consulting Arborist for your next tree report or building project. AQF level 5 Arborist or consulting Arborist as they are known, is qualified to write reports for councils, commercial or private clients. An AQF level 3 Arborist (Practising Arborist) is not qualified to write reports under Australian standards for education in the tree industry. You will also find that persons with University qualifications such as Hort science degree or a degree in Arboriculture may write reports. Report writing is a specialised profession carried out by trained professionals meeting the above requirements and experience in the tree industry. At Canopy Tree PL we can facilitate with providing an AQF level 5 Consulting Arborist for your next tree report or building project. AQF level 5 Arborist or consulting Arborist as they are known, is qualified to write reports for councils, commercial or private clients. An AQF level 3 Arborist (Practising Arborist) is not qualified to write reports under Australian standards for education in the tree industry. You will also find that persons with University qualifications such as Hort science degree or a degree in Arboriculture may write reports. Report writing is a specialised profession carried out by trained professionals meeting the above requirements and experience in the tree industry. AQF level 5 Arborist or consulting Arborist as they are known, is qualified to write reports for councils, commercial or private clients. An AQF level 3 Arborist (Practising Arborist) is not qualified to write reports under Australian standards for education in the tree industry. You will also find that persons with University qualifications such as Hort science degree or a degree in Arboriculture may write reports. Report writing is a specialised profession carried out by trained professionals meeting the above requirements and experience in the tree industry. At Canopy Tree PL we can facilitate with providing an AQF level 5 Consulting Arborist for your next tree report or building project. Please call us today to find out more?\r\n<h5></h5>\r\n<h3 class=\"widget-title\">Feature Services</h3>\r\n<a class=\"page-box__picture\" href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/our-services/tree-pruning/\"><img class=\"attachment-page-box wp-post-image\" src=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/2-360x240.png\" alt=\"2\" width=\"360\" height=\"240\" /></a>\r\n<h5 class=\"page-box__title  text-uppercase\"><a href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/our-services/tree-pruning/\">Tree Pruning</a></h5>\r\nThe process carried out by utilising all the above methods on a small scale when pruning young newly planted trees, small ornamental trees, small street trees, trees under service lines or power lines. AQF level 5 Arborist or consulting Arborist as they are known, is qualified to write reports for councils, commercial or private clients. An AQF level 3 Arborist (Practising Arborist) is not qualified to write reports under Australian standards for education in the tree industry. You will also find that persons with University qualifications such as Hort science degree or a degree in Arboriculture may write reports. Report writing is a specialised profession carried out by trained professionals meeting the above requirements and experience in the tree industry. AQF level 5 Arborist or consulting Arborist as they are known, is qualified to write reports for councils, commercial or private clients. An AQF level 3 Arborist (Practising Arborist) is not qualified to write reports under Australian standards for education in the tree industry. You will also find that persons with University qualifications such as Hort science degree or a degree in Arboriculture may write reports. Report writing is a specialised profession carried out by trained professionals meeting the above requirements and experience in the tree industry. At Canopy Tree PL we can facilitate with providing an AQF level 5 Consulting Arborist for your next tree report or building project. AQF level 5 Arborist or consulting Arborist as they are known, is qualified to write reports for councils, commercial or private clients. An AQF level 3 Arborist (Practising Arborist) is not qualified to write reports under Australian standards for education in the tree industry. You will also find that persons with University qualifications such as Hort science degree or a degree in Arboriculture may write reports. Report writing is a specialised profession carried out by trained professionals meeting the above requirements and experience in the tree industry. At Canopy Tree PL we can facilitate with providing an AQF level 5 Consulting Arborist for your next tree report or building project. AQF level 5 Arborist or consulting Arborist as they are known, is qualified to write reports for councils, commercial or private clients. An AQF level 3 Arborist (Practising Arborist) is not qualified to write reports under Australian standards for education in the tree industry. You will also find that persons with University qualifications such as Hort science degree or a degree in Arboriculture may write reports. Report writing is a specialised profession carried out by trained professionals meeting the above requirements and experience in the tree industry. At Canopy Tree PL we can facilitate with providing an AQF level 5 Consulting Arborist for your next tree report or building project. The owner is a member of Arboriculture Australia and the International Society of Arboriculture keeping up to date with industry news and standards. Nicholas is still an active tree climber in the business with an education, wide experience of trees and over twenty years in the industry.\r\n<h5></h5>\r\n<h5><span style=\"color: #fcc71f;\">ï¿½</span><b>OUR AIM</b></h5>\r\nCanopy Tree Pty Ltd aims to provide superior standards of tree maintenance, conservation, service and education through dedication, commitment and purpose in all aspects of the amenity tree industry. All work is conducted to the Australian Standard Pruning of Amenity Trees AS4373-2007 and to the current code of practice put out by Work Cover for the Amenity Tree Industryï¿½1998.\r\n<h5><span style=\"color: #fcc71f;\">ï¿½</span></h5>\r\n<h3 class=\"widget-title\">Why Choose Us</h3>\r\n<h5>ï¿½<b>CONSULTATION &amp; SOLUTIONS</b></h5>\r\nAt Canopy Tree we believe there is a need for consultation regarding all things trees. We are here to provide our wealth of knowledge experience and education to you in identifying, helping and providing you with quick reliable and precise outcomes for your tree needs. It may be a simple as tree identification or more complex outcomes regarding pest, disease or root mapping and solutions. Whatever it may be give us a call today with your enquiry? We will provide an estimate of costs and arrange a site visit on your approval!\r\n<h5><span style=\"color: #fcc71f;\">ï¿½</span><b>REPORTS &amp; MANAGEMENT PLANS</b></h5>\r\nReport &amp; management plans come in many different forms, dependant on the outcome required. AQF level 5 Arborist or consulting Arborist as they are known, is qualified to write reports for councils, commercial or private clients. An AQF level 3 Arborist (Practising Arborist) is not qualified to write reports under Australian standards for education in the tree industry. You will also find that persons with University qualifications such as Hort science degree or a degree in Arboriculture may write reports. Report writing is a specialised profession carried out by trained professionals meeting the above requirements and experience in the tree industry. At Canopy Tree PL we can facilitate with providing an AQF level 5 Consulting Arborist for your next tree report or building project. Please call us today to find out more?\r\n<h5></h5>\r\n&nbsp;\r\n<h3 class=\"widget-title\">Feature Services</h3>\r\n<a class=\"page-box__picture\" href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/our-services/tree-pruning/\"><img class=\"attachment-page-box wp-post-image\" src=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/2-360x240.png\" alt=\"2\" width=\"360\" height=\"240\" /></a>\r\n<h5 class=\"page-box__title  text-uppercase\"><a href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/our-services/tree-pruning/\">Tree Pruning</a></h5>\r\nThe process carried out by utilising all the above methods on a small scale when pruning young newly planted trees, small ornamental trees, small street trees, trees under service lines or power lines. AQF level 5 Arborist or consulting Arborist as they are known, is qualified to write reports for councils, commercial or private clients. An AQF level 3 Arborist (Practising Arborist) is not qualified to write reports under Australian standards for education in the tree industry. You will also find that persons with University qualifications such as Hort science degree or a degree in Arboriculture may write reports. Report writing is a specialised profession carried out by trained professionals meeting the above requirements and experience in the tree industry. At Canopy Tree PL we can facilitate with providing an AQF level 5 Consulting Arborist for your next tree report or building project. AQF level 5 Arborist or consulting Arborist as they are known, is qualified to write reports for councils, commercial or private clients. An AQF level 3 Arborist (Practising Arborist) is not qualified to write reports under Australian standards for education in the tree industry. You will also find that persons with University qualifications such as Hort science degree or a degree in Arboriculture may write reports. Report writing is a specialised profession carried out by trained professionals meeting the above requirements and experience in the tree industry. At Canopy Tree PL we can facilitate with providing an AQF level 5 Consulting Arborist for your next tree report or building project. All work is conducted to the Australian Standard Pruning of Amenity Trees AS4373-2007 and to the current code of practice put out by Work Cover for the Amenity Tree Industryï¿½1998.\r\n<h5><span style=\"color: #fcc71f;\">ï¿½</span></h5>\r\n<h3 class=\"widget-title\">Why Choose Us</h3>\r\n<h5>ï¿½<b>CONSULTATION &amp; SOLUTIONS</b></h5>\r\nAt Canopy Tree we believe there is a need for consultation regarding all things trees. We will provide an estimate of costs and arrange a site visit on your approval!\r\n<h5><span style=\"color: #fcc71f;\">ï¿½</span><b>REPORTS &amp; MANAGEMENT PLANS</b></h5>\r\nReport &amp; management plans come in many different forms, dependant on the outcome required. AQF level 5 Arborist or consulting Arborist as they are known, is qualified to write reports for councils, commercial or private clients. An AQF level 3 Arborist (Practising Arborist) is not qualified to write reports under Australian standards for education in the tree industry. You will also find that persons with University qualifications such as Hort science degree or a degree in Arboriculture may write reports. Report writing is a specialised profession carried out by trained professionals meeting the above requirements and experience in the tree industry. At Canopy Tree PL we can facilitate with providing an AQF level 5 Consulting Arborist for your next tree report or building project. Please call us today to find out more?\r\n<h5></h5>\r\n<h3 class=\"widget-title\">Feature Services</h3>\r\n<a class=\"page-box__picture\" href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/our-services/tree-pruning/\"><img class=\"attachment-page-box wp-post-image\" src=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/2-360x240.png\" alt=\"2\" width=\"360\" height=\"240\" /></a>\r\n<h5 class=\"page-box__title  text-uppercase\"><a href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/our-services/tree-pruning/\">Tree Pruning</a></h5>\r\nThe process carried out by utilising all the above methods on a small scale when pruning young newly planted trees, small ornamental trees, small street trees, trees under service lines or power lines. pest and diseases, some may be specific to a certain species others may be more general covering a variety of trees. [button style=\"primary\" href=\"tel:1300 799 540\"]CALL NOW[/button] [button style=\"default\" href=\"contact-us\"]INQUIRE NOW[/button]\r\n<h3 class=\"widget-title\">Who We Are</h3>\r\n<h5><span style=\"color: #16d116;\">ï¿½</span><b>CANOPY TREE PTY LTD</b></h5>\r\nCanopy Tree PL has been servicing the greater Sydney and Macarthur areas for 16 years. The business is locally owned and operated, which enables us to offer high quality Tree work, tree care &amp; consultancy with practical and safe outcomes. The owner is a member of Arboriculture Australia and the International Society of Arboriculture keeping up to date with industry news and standards. Nicholas is still an active tree climber in the business with an education, wide experience of trees and over twenty years in the industry.\r\n<h5></h5>\r\n<h5><span style=\"color: #fcc71f;\">ï¿½</span><b>OUR AIM</b></h5>\r\nCanopy Tree Pty Ltd aims to provide superior standards of tree maintenance, conservation, service and education through dedication, commitment and purpose in all aspects of the amenity tree industry. All work is conducted to the Australian Standard Pruning of Amenity Trees AS4373-2007 and to the current code of practice put out by Work Cover for the Amenity Tree Industryï¿½1998.\r\n<h5><span style=\"color: #fcc71f;\">ï¿½</span></h5>\r\n<h3 class=\"widget-title\">Why Choose Us</h3>\r\n<h5>ï¿½<b>CONSULTATION &amp; SOLUTIONS</b></h5>\r\nAt Canopy Tree we believe there is a need for consultation regarding all things trees. We are here to provide our wealth of knowledge experience and education to you in identifying, helping and providing you with quick reliable and precise outcomes for your tree needs. It may be a simple as tree identification or more complex outcomes regarding pest, disease or root mapping and solutions. Whatever it may be give us a call today with your enquiry? We will provide an estimate of costs and arrange a site visit on your approval!\r\n<h5><span style=\"color: #fcc71f;\">ï¿½</span><b>REPORTS &amp; MANAGEMENT PLANS</b></h5>\r\nReport &amp; management plans come in many different forms, dependant on the outcome required. AQF level 5 Arborist or consulting Arborist as they are known, is qualified to write reports for councils, commercial or private clients. An AQF level 3 Arborist (Practising Arborist) is not qualified to write reports under Australian standards for education in the tree industry. You will also find that persons with University qualifications such as Hort science degree or a degree in Arboriculture may write reports. Report writing is a specialised profession carried out by trained professionals meeting the above requirements and experience in the tree industry. At Canopy Tree PL we can facilitate with providing an AQF level 5 Consulting Arborist for your next tree report or building project. [button style=\"primary\" href=\"tel:1300 799 540\"]CALL NOW[/button] [button style=\"default\" href=\"contact-us\"]INQUIRE NOW[/button]\r\n<h3 class=\"widget-title\">Who We Are</h3>\r\n<h5><span style=\"color: #16d116;\">ï¿½</span><b>CANOPY TREE PTY LTD</b></h5>\r\nCanopy Tree PL has been servicing the greater Sydney and Macarthur areas for 16 years. The business is locally owned and operated, which enables us to offer high quality Tree work, tree care &amp; consultancy with practical and safe outcomes. The owner is a member of Arboriculture Australia and the International Society of Arboriculture keeping up to date with industry news and standards. Nicholas is still an active tree climber in the business with an education, wide experience of trees and over twenty years in the industry.\r\n<h5></h5>\r\n<h5><span style=\"color: #fcc71f;\">ï¿½</span><b>OUR AIM</b></h5>\r\nCanopy Tree Pty Ltd aims to provide superior standards of tree maintenance, conservation, service and education through dedication, commitment and purpose in all aspects of the amenity tree industry. All work is conducted to the Australian Standard Pruning of Amenity Trees AS4373-2007 and to the current code of practice put out by Work Cover for the Amenity Tree Industryï¿½1998.\r\n<h5><span style=\"color: #fcc71f;\">ï¿½</span></h5>\r\n<h3 class=\"widget-title\">Why Choose Us</h3>\r\n<h5>ï¿½<b>CONSULTATION &amp; SOLUTIONS</b></h5>\r\nAt Canopy Tree we believe there is a need for consultation regarding all things trees. We are here to provide our wealth of knowledge experience and education to you in identifying, helping and providing you with quick reliable and precise outcomes for your tree needs. It may be a simple as tree identification or more complex outcomes regarding pest, disease or root mapping and solutions. Whatever it may be give us a call today with your enquiry? We will provide an estimate of costs and arrange a site visit on your approval!\r\n<h5><span style=\"color: #fcc71f;\">ï¿½</span><b>REPORTS &amp; MANAGEMENT PLANS</b></h5>\r\nReport &amp; management plans come in many different forms, dependant on the outcome required. AQF level 5 Arborist or consulting Arborist as they are known, is qualified to write reports for councils, commercial or private clients. An AQF level 3 Arborist (Practising Arborist) is not qualified to write reports under Australian standards for education in the tree industry. You will also find that persons with University qualifications such as Hort science degree or a degree in Arboriculture may write reports. Report writing is a specialised profession carried out by trained professionals meeting the above requirements and experience in the tree industry. At Canopy Tree PL we can facilitate with providing an AQF level 5 Consulting Arborist for your next tree report or building project. /></a>\r\n<h5 class=\"page-box__title  text-uppercase\"><a href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/pest-and-disease/\">Pest and Disease</a></h5>\r\nLike Humans trees also suffer from a variety of pest and diseases, some may be specific to a certain species others may be more general covering a variety of trees.\r\n\r\n<a class=\"read-more  read-more--page-box\" all shapes, sizes and conditions and as a self-optimising structure trees must change to increase their shape and size to maximise the energy from the sun.\r\n\r\n<a class=\"read-more  read-more--page-box\" href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/tree-hazard-risk-assessment/\">Read more</a>\r\n\r\n<a class=\"page-box__picture\" AQF level 5 Arborist or consulting Arborist, is qualified to write reports and management plans for councils, commercial or private clients. You will also find that persons with University qualifications such as Hort science degree or a degree in Arboriculture may write reports. Report writing is a specialised profession carried out by trained professionals meeting the required education and experience in the tree industry. At Canopy Tree PL we can facilitate with providing an AQF level 5 Consulting Arborist for your next tree report or building project. Please call us today to find out more?</p><h5>&nbsp;</h5><h3 class=\"widget-title\">Feature Services</h3>\r\n				\r\n					<a class=\"page-box__picture\" href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/our-services/tree-pruning/\"><img width=\"360\" height=\"240\" src=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/2-360x240.png\" class=\"attachment-page-box wp-post-image\" alt=\"2\"></a>\r\n					\r\n						<h5 class=\"page-box__title  text-uppercase\"><a href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/our-services/tree-pruning/\">Tree Pruning</a></h5>\r\n						The process carried out by utilising all the above methods on a small scale when pruning young newly planted trees, small ornamental trees and trees under service lines or power lines. 													<p><a href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/our-services/tree-pruning/\" class=\"read-more  read-more--page-box\">Read more</a></p>\r\n											\r\n				\r\n\r\n				\r\n				\r\n					<a class=\"page-box__picture\" href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/our-services/tree-removal/\"><img width=\"360\" height=\"240\" src=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Tree-Removal-360x240.jpg\" class=\"attachment-page-box wp-post-image\" alt=\"Tree Removal\"></a>\r\n					\r\n						<h5 class=\"page-box__title  text-uppercase\"><a href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/our-services/tree-removal/\">Tree Removal</a></h5>\r\n						The process of removing a tree/palm from its standing form to ground level. Canopy Tree only remove trees if it is justified and the permission is granted from your local council.													<p><a href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/our-services/tree-removal/\" class=\"read-more  read-more--page-box\">Read more</a></p>\r\n											\r\n				\r\n\r\n				\r\n				\r\n					<a class=\"page-box__picture\" href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/wood-chip-and-leaf-mulch-suppliers/\"><img width=\"360\" height=\"240\" src=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Woodchip-leafmulch-suppliesLeaf-360x240.jpg\" class=\"attachment-page-box wp-post-image\" alt=\"Woodchip &amp; leafmulch suppliesLeaf\"></a>\r\n					\r\n						<h5 class=\"page-box__title  text-uppercase\"><a href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/wood-chip-and-leaf-mulch-suppliers/\">Wood Chip and Leaf Mulch Supplies</a></h5>\r\n						Where the client has requested to remove the tree cuttings from site, we will use a wood chipper to chip all material into the back of one of our containerised tipping trucks.													<p><a href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/wood-chip-and-leaf-mulch-suppliers/\" class=\"read-more  read-more--page-box\">Read more</a></p>\r\n											\r\n				\r\n\r\n				\r\n			\r\n				<h2 class=\"widget-title\">\r\n				\r\n					Testimonials				</h2>\r\n				\r\n					<!-- Wrapper for slides -->\r\n					\r\n						\r\n							\r\n																							\r\n									<blockquote class=\"testimonial__quote\">\r\n										Canopy Tree did a large amount of work at our property during 2008, trimming a large Tree in our back yard that hung heavily over the neighbours fence and our own roof. Canopy Tree offered a very good rate compared to others that had quoted for the same job. We are the best Arborist in Sydney!				\r\n				\r\n					[button style=\"primary\" href=\"tel:1300 799 540\"]CALL NOW[/button] [button style=\"default\" href=\"contact-us\"]INQUIRE NOW[/button]				\r\n			<h3 class=\"widget-title\">Who We Are</h3><h5><span style=\"color: #16d116;\"><span style=\"color: #ffffff;\"><span class=\"icon-container\"><span class=\"fa fa-tree\"></span></span></span>&nbsp;</span><b>CANOPY TREE PTY LTD</b></h5><p>Canopy Tree PL has been servicing the greater Sydney and Macarthur areas for 16 years. The business is locally owned and operated, which enables us to offer high quality Tree work, tree care &amp; consultancy with practical and safe outcomes. The owner is a member of Arboriculture Australia and the International Society of Arboriculture keeping up to date with industry news and standards. Nicholas is still an active tree climber in the business with an education, wide experience of trees and over twenty years in the industry.</p><h5>&nbsp;<span style=\"color: #fcc71f;\"><span style=\"color: #ffffff;\"><span class=\"icon-container\"><span class=\"fa fa-tree\"></span></span></span>&nbsp;</span><b>OUR AIM</b></h5><p>Canopy Tree Pty Ltd aims to provide superior standards of tree maintenance, conservation, service and education through dedication, commitment and purpose in all aspects of the amenity tree industry. All work is conducted to the Australian Standard Pruning of Amenity Trees AS4373-2007 and to the current code of practice put out by Work Cover for the Amenity Tree Industry&nbsp;1998.</p><h5><span style=\"color: #fcc71f;\">&nbsp;</span></h5><h3 class=\"widget-title\">Why Choose Us</h3><h5><span style=\"color: #ffffff;\"> <span class=\"icon-container\"><span class=\"fa fa-tree\"></span></span></span>&nbsp;<b>CONSULTATION &amp; SOLUTIONS</b></h5><p>At Canopy Tree we believe there is a need for consultation regarding all things trees. We are here to provide our wealth of knowledge experience and education to you in identifying, helping and providing you with quick reliable and precise outcomes for your tree needs. Call us today with your enquiry?</p><h5><span style=\"color: #fcc71f;\"><span style=\"color: #ffffff;\"><span class=\"icon-container\"><span class=\"fa fa-tree\"></span></span></span>&nbsp;</span><b>REPORTS &amp; MANAGEMENT PLANS</b></h5><p>Report &amp; management plans come in many different forms, dependant on the outcome required. AQF level 5 Arborist or consulting Arborist, is qualified to write reports and management plans for councils, commercial or private clients. You will also find that persons with University qualifications such as Hort science degree or a degree in Arboriculture may write reports. Report writing is a specialised profession carried out by trained professionals meeting the required education and experience in the tree industry. At Canopy Tree PL we can facilitate with providing an AQF level 5 Consulting Arborist for your next tree report or building project. Please call us today to find out more?</p><h5>&nbsp;</h5><h3 class=\"widget-title\">Feature Services</h3>\r\n				\r\n					<a class=\"page-box__picture\" href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/our-services/tree-pruning/\"><img width=\"360\" height=\"240\" src=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/2-360x240.png\" class=\"attachment-page-box wp-post-image\" alt=\"2\"></a>\r\n					\r\n						<h5 class=\"page-box__title  text-uppercase\"><a href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/our-services/tree-pruning/\">Tree Pruning</a></h5>\r\n						The process carried out by utilising all the above methods on a small scale when pruning young newly planted trees, small ornamental trees and trees under service lines or power lines. 													<p><a href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/our-services/tree-pruning/\" class=\"read-more  read-more--page-box\">Read more</a></p>\r\n											\r\n				\r\n\r\n				\r\n				\r\n					<a class=\"page-box__picture\" href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/our-services/tree-removal/\"><img width=\"360\" height=\"240\" src=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Tree-Removal-360x240.jpg\" class=\"attachment-page-box wp-post-image\" alt=\"Tree Removal\"></a>\r\n					\r\n						<h5 class=\"page-box__title  text-uppercase\"><a href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/our-services/tree-removal/\">Tree Removal</a></h5>\r\n						The process of removing a tree/palm from its standing form to ground level. Canopy Tree only remove trees if it is justified and the permission is granted from your local council.													<p><a href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/our-services/tree-removal/\" class=\"read-more  read-more--page-box\">Read more</a></p>\r\n											\r\n				\r\n\r\n				\r\n				\r\n					<a class=\"page-box__picture\" href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/wood-chip-and-leaf-mulch-suppliers/\"><img width=\"360\" height=\"240\" src=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Woodchip-leafmulch-suppliesLeaf-360x240.jpg\" class=\"attachment-page-box wp-post-image\" alt=\"Woodchip &amp; leafmulch suppliesLeaf\"></a>\r\n					\r\n						<h5 class=\"page-box__title  text-uppercase\"><a href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/wood-chip-and-leaf-mulch-suppliers/\">Wood Chip and Leaf Mulch Supplies</a></h5>\r\n						Where the client has requested to remove the tree cuttings from site, we will use a wood chipper to chip all material into the back of one of our containerised tipping trucks.													<p><a href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/wood-chip-and-leaf-mulch-suppliers/\" class=\"read-more  read-more--page-box\">Read more</a></p>\r\n											\r\n				\r\n\r\n				\r\n			\r\n				<h2 class=\"widget-title\">\r\n				\r\n					Testimonials				</h2>\r\n				\r\n					<!-- Wrapper for slides -->\r\n					\r\n						\r\n							\r\n																							\r\n									<blockquote class=\"testimonial__quote\">\r\n										Canopy Tree did a large amount of work at our property during 2008, trimming a large Tree in our back yard that hung heavily over the neighbours fence and our own roof. We are the best Arborist in Sydney!				\r\n				\r\n					[button style=\"primary\" href=\"tel:1300 799 540\"]CALL NOW[/button] [button style=\"default\" href=\"contact-us\"]INQUIRE NOW[/button]				\r\n			<h3 class=\"widget-title\">Who We Are</h3><h5><span style=\"color: #16d116;\"><span style=\"color: #ffffff;\"><span class=\"icon-container\"><span class=\"fa fa-tree\"></span></span></span>&nbsp;</span><b>CANOPY TREE PTY LTD</b></h5><p>Canopy Tree PL has been servicing the greater Sydney and Macarthur areas for 16 years. The business is locally owned and operated, which enables us to offer high quality Tree work, tree care &amp; consultancy with practical and safe outcomes. The owner is a member of Arboriculture Australia and the International Society of Arboriculture keeping up to date with industry news and standards. Nicholas is still an active tree climber in the business with an education, wide experience of trees and over twenty years in the industry.</p><h5>&nbsp;<span style=\"color: #fcc71f;\"><span style=\"color: #ffffff;\"><span class=\"icon-container\"><span class=\"fa fa-tree\"></span></span></span>&nbsp;</span><b>OUR AIM</b></h5><p>Canopy Tree Pty Ltd aims to provide superior standards of tree maintenance, conservation, service and education through dedication, commitment and purpose in all aspects of the amenity tree industry. All work is conducted to the Australian Standard Pruning of Amenity Trees AS4373-2007 and to the current code of practice put out by Work Cover for the Amenity Tree Industry&nbsp;1998.</p><h5><span style=\"color: #fcc71f;\">&nbsp;</span></h5><h3 class=\"widget-title\">Why Choose Us</h3><h5><span style=\"color: #ffffff;\"> <span class=\"icon-container\"><span class=\"fa fa-tree\"></span></span></span>&nbsp;<b>CONSULTATION &amp; SOLUTIONS</b></h5><p>At Canopy Tree we believe there is a need for consultation regarding all things trees. We are here to provide our wealth of knowledge experience and education to you in identifying, helping and providing you with quick reliable and precise outcomes for your tree needs. Call us today with your enquiry?</p><h5><span style=\"color: #fcc71f;\"><span style=\"color: #ffffff;\"><span class=\"icon-container\"><span class=\"fa fa-tree\"></span></span></span>&nbsp;</span><b>REPORTS &amp; MANAGEMENT PLANS</b></h5><p>Report &amp; management plans come in many different forms, dependant on the outcome required. AQF level 5 Arborist or consulting Arborist, is qualified to write reports and management plans for councils, commercial or private clients. You will also find that persons with University qualifications such as Hort science degree or a degree in Arboriculture may write reports. Report writing is a specialised profession carried out by trained professionals meeting the required education and experience in the tree industry. At Canopy Tree PL we can facilitate with providing an AQF level 5 Consulting Arborist for your next tree report or building project. The business is locally owned and operated, which enables us to offer high quality Tree work, tree care &amp; consultancy with practical and safe outcomes. The owner is a member of Arboriculture Australia and the International Society of Arboriculture keeping up to date with industry news and standards. Nicholas is still an active tree climber in the business with an education, wide experience of trees and over twenty years in the industry.</p><h5>&nbsp;<span style=\"color: #fcc71f;\"><span style=\"color: #ffffff;\"><span class=\"icon-container\"><span class=\"fa fa-tree\"></span></span></span>&nbsp;</span><b>OUR AIM</b></h5><p>Canopy Tree Pty Ltd aims to provide superior standards of tree maintenance, conservation, service and education through dedication, commitment and purpose in all aspects of the amenity tree industry. All work is conducted to the Australian Standard Pruning of Amenity Trees AS4373-2007 and to the current code of practice put out by Work Cover for the Amenity Tree Industry&nbsp;1998.</p><h5><span style=\"color: #fcc71f;\">&nbsp;</span></h5><h3 class=\"widget-title\">Why Choose Us</h3><h5><span style=\"color: #ffffff;\"> <span class=\"icon-container\"><span class=\"fa fa-tree\"></span></span></span>&nbsp;<b>CONSULTATION &amp; SOLUTIONS</b></h5><p>At Canopy Tree we believe there is a need for consultation regarding all things trees. We are the best Arborist in Sydney!				\r\n				\r\n					[button style=\"primary\" href=\"tel:1300 799 540\"]CALL NOW[/button] [button style=\"default\" href=\"contact-us\"]INQUIRE NOW[/button]				\r\n			<h3 class=\"widget-title\">Who We Are</h3><h5><span style=\"color: #16d116;\"><span style=\"color: #ffffff;\"><span class=\"icon-container\"><span class=\"fa fa-tree\"></span></span></span>&nbsp;</span><b>CANOPY TREE PTY LTD</b></h5><p>Canopy Tree PL has been servicing the greater Sydney and Macarthur and Southern Highland areas for 16 years. The business is locally owned and operated, which enables us to offer high quality Tree work, tree care &amp; consultancy with practical and safe outcomes. The owner is a member of Arboriculture Australia and the International Society of Arboriculture keeping up to date with industry news and standards. Nicholas is still an active tree climber in the business with an education, wide experience of trees and over twenty years in the industry.</p><h5>&nbsp;<span style=\"color: #fcc71f;\"><span style=\"color: #ffffff;\"><span class=\"icon-container\"><span class=\"fa fa-tree\"></span></span></span>&nbsp;</span><b>OUR AIM</b></h5><p>Canopy Tree Pty Ltd aims to provide superior standards of tree maintenance, conservation, service and education through dedication, commitment and purpose in all aspects of the amenity tree industry. All work is conducted to the Australian Standard Pruning of Amenity Trees AS4373-2007 and to the current code of practice put out by Work Cover for the Amenity Tree Industry&nbsp;1998.</p><h5><span style=\"color: #fcc71f;\">&nbsp;</span></h5><h3 class=\"widget-title\">Why Choose Us</h3><h5><span style=\"color: #ffffff;\"> <span class=\"icon-container\"><span class=\"fa fa-tree\"></span></span></span>&nbsp;<b>CONSULTATION &amp; SOLUTIONS</b></h5><p>At Canopy Tree we believe there is a need for consultation regarding all things trees. We are here to provide our wealth of knowledge experience and education to you in identifying, helping and providing you with quick reliable and precise outcomes for your tree needs. Call us today with your enquiry?</p><h5><span style=\"color: #fcc71f;\"><span style=\"color: #ffffff;\"><span class=\"icon-container\"><span class=\"fa fa-tree\"></span></span></span>&nbsp;</span><b>REPORTS &amp; MANAGEMENT PLANS</b></h5><p>Report &amp; management plans come in many different forms, dependant on the outcome required. AQF level 5 Arborist or consulting Arborist, is qualified to write reports and management plans for councils, commercial or private clients. You will also find that persons with University qualifications such as Hort science degree or a degree in Arboriculture may write reports. Report writing is a specialised profession carried out by trained professionals meeting the required education and experience in the tree industry. At Canopy Tree PL we can facilitate with providing an AQF level 5 Consulting Arborist for your next tree report or building project. Please call us today to find out more?</p><h5>&nbsp;</h5><h3 class=\"widget-title\">Feature Services</h3>\r\n				\r\n					<a class=\"page-box__picture\" href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/our-services/tree-pruning/\"><img width=\"360\" height=\"240\" src=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Tree-Maintanance-Caravan-Park-360x240.jpg\" class=\"attachment-page-box wp-post-image\" alt=\"Tree Maintanance Caravan Park\"></a>\r\n					\r\n						<h5 class=\"page-box__title  text-uppercase\"><a href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/our-services/tree-pruning/\">Tree Pruning</a></h5>\r\n						The process carried out by utilising all the above methods on a small scale when pruning young newly planted trees, small ornamental trees and trees under service lines or power lines. 													<p><a href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/our-services/tree-pruning/\" class=\"read-more  read-more--page-box\">Read more</a></p>\r\n											\r\n				\r\n\r\n				\r\n				\r\n					<a class=\"page-box__picture\" href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/our-services/tree-removal/\"><img width=\"360\" height=\"240\" src=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Tree-Removal-360x240.jpg\" class=\"attachment-page-box wp-post-image\" alt=\"Tree Removal\"></a>\r\n					\r\n						<h5 class=\"page-box__title  text-uppercase\"><a href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/our-services/tree-removal/\">Tree Removal</a></h5>\r\n						The process of removing a tree/palm from its standing form to ground level. We are the best Arborist in Sydney!				\r\n				\r\n					[button style=\"primary\" href=\"tel:1300 799 540\"]CALL NOW[/button] [button style=\"default\" href=\"contact-us\"]INQUIRE NOW[/button]				\r\n			<h3 class=\"widget-title\">Who We Are</h3><h5><span style=\"color: #16d116;\"><span style=\"color: #ffffff;\"><span class=\"icon-container\"><span class=\"fa fa-tree\"></span></span></span>&nbsp;</span><b>CANOPY TREE PTY LTD</b></h5><p>Canopy Tree PL has been servicing the greater Sydney and Macarthur,&nbsp;Southern Highland areas for 16 years. The business is locally owned and operated, which enables us to offer high quality Tree work, tree care &amp; consultancy with practical and safe outcomes. The owner is a member of Arboriculture Australia and the International Society of Arboriculture keeping up to date with industry news and standards. Nicholas is still an active tree climber in the business with an education, wide experience of trees and over twenty years in the industry.</p><h5>&nbsp;<span style=\"color: #fcc71f;\"><span style=\"color: #ffffff;\"><span class=\"icon-container\"><span class=\"fa fa-tree\"></span></span></span>&nbsp;</span><b>OUR AIM</b></h5><p>Canopy Tree Pty Ltd aims to provide superior standards of tree maintenance, conservation, service and education through dedication, commitment and purpose in all aspects of the amenity tree industry. All work is conducted to the Australian Standard Pruning of Amenity Trees AS4373-2007 and to the current code of practice put out by Work Cover for the Amenity Tree Industry&nbsp;1998.</p><h5><span style=\"color: #fcc71f;\">&nbsp;</span></h5><h3 class=\"widget-title\">Why Choose Us</h3><h5><span style=\"color: #ffffff;\"> <span class=\"icon-container\"><span class=\"fa fa-tree\"></span></span></span>&nbsp;<b>CONSULTATION &amp; SOLUTIONS</b></h5><p>At Canopy Tree we believe there is a need for consultation regarding all things trees. AQF level 5 Arborist or consulting Arborist, is qualified to write reports and management plans for councils, commercial or private clients. You will also find that persons with University qualifications such as Hort science degree or a degree in Arboriculture may write reports. Report writing is a specialised profession carried out by trained professionals meeting the required education and experience in the tree industry. At Canopy Tree PL we can facilitate with providing an AQF level 5 Consulting Arborist for your next tree report or building project. clients.</a></p><a href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/Terms-of-Contract-Pty-2015-Ltd.pdf\">\r\n			\r\n				<h2 class=\"widget-title\">\r\n				\r\n					Testimonials				</h2>\r\n				\r\n					<!-- Wrapper for slides -->\r\n					\r\n						\r\n							\r\n																							\r\n									<blockquote class=\"testimonial__quote\">\r\n										Canopy Tree Management &amp; Solutions has over the last few months been engaged by us for the task of gaining council approval &amp; then extracting 3 very large trees from out block in Ashfield. ISA</h3><p><img class=\"alignleft wp-image-913 \" src=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/AAMemberlogosWEBRGB110.png\" alt=\"ISA Member Nick Ford\" width=\"167\" height=\"82\"></p><h3 class=\"widget-title\">Insurances</h3><ul><li>&nbsp;Public Liability 20m Liberty International Policy number 101919 current</li><li>Underwritten by Fitzpatrick &amp; Tree operator\'s scope of works included manual tree take-down of upper sections of diseased Fig tree, stump grinding and root bole extractions, separations of contaminated root material from spoil and disposal off site. Project was completed successfully without fuss. Thank you for your assistance in this project. 									</blockquote>\r\n									<cite class=\"testimonial__author\">\r\n										Sean McCarthy - Sydney Foreshore Authority									</cite>\r\n\r\n																			\r\n										<i class=\"fa  fa-star\"></i><i class=\"fa  fa-star\"></i><i class=\"fa  fa-star\"></i><i class=\"fa  fa-star\"></i><i class=\"fa  fa-star\"></i>																		\r\n								\r\n														\r\n						\r\n					\r\n				\r\n			\r\n\r\n			\r\n			\r\n				<h2 class=\"widget-title\">\r\n				\r\n					Testimonials				</h2>\r\n				\r\n					<!-- Wrapper for slides -->\r\n					\r\n						\r\n							\r\n																							\r\n									<blockquote class=\"testimonial__quote\">\r\n										Canopy Tree Management &amp; Solutions has over the last few months been engaged by us for the task of gaining council approval &amp; then extracting 3 very large trees from out block in Ashfield. Nicholas was punctual, detailed and price competitive. We were kept informed of all developments, rain delays, etc. The site was left clean, without damage to adjacent plants, pots or fences. We would not hesitate to recommend Nicholas for any tree management jobs in the future.\r\n<br>\r\n<br>\r\n<br>\r\n<br>									</blockquote>\r\n									<cite class=\"testimonial__author\">\r\n										Nora-Mary &amp; Gary									</cite>\r\n\r\n																			\r\n										<i class=\"fa  fa-star\"></i><i class=\"fa  fa-star\"></i><i class=\"fa AQF level 5 Arborist or consulting Arborist as they are known, is qualified to write reports for councils, commercial or private clients. An AQF level 3 Arborist (Practising Arborist) is not qualified to write reports under Australian standards for education in the tree industry. You will also find that persons with University qualifications such as Hort science degree or a degree in Arboriculture may write reports. Report writing is a specialised profession carried out by trained professionals meeting the above requirements and experience in the tree industry.\r\n<h5></h5>\r\n<h3 class=\"widget-title\">Who We Are?</h3>\r\n<h5><span style=\"color: #fcc71f;\">ï¿½</span><b>CANOPY TREE PTY LTD</b></h5>\r\nCanopy Tree PL has been servicing the greater Sydney and Macarthur areas for 16 years. Nicholas is still an active tree climber in the business with an education, wide experience of trees and over twenty years in the industry. AQF level 5 Arborist or consulting Arborist as they are known, is qualified to write reports for councils, commercial or private clients. An AQF level 3 Arborist (Practising Arborist) is not qualified to write reports under Australian standards for education in the tree industry. You will also find that persons with University qualifications such as Hort science degree or a degree in Arboriculture may write reports. Report writing is a specialised profession carried out by trained professionals meeting the above requirements and experience in the tree industry.\r\n<h5></h5>\r\n<h3 class=\"widget-title\">Who We Are?</h3>\r\n<h5><span style=\"color: #fcc71f;\">ï¿½</span><b>CANOPY TREE PTY LTD</b></h5>\r\nCanopy Tree PL has been servicing the greater Sydney and Macarthur areas for 16 years. UPDATE wp_posts SET post_content = "<p>&nbsp;</p><p><a href=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/Tree-Maintanance-Caravan-Park.jpg\"><img class=\"alignleft size-large wp-image-1415\" src=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/Tree-Maintanance-Caravan-Park-768x1024.jpg\" alt=\"Tree Maintanance Caravan Park\" width=\"768\" height=\"1024\"></a></p><h3 class=\"widget-title\">Tree Pruning</h3><p>Pruning a tree is an art that takes practice and knowledge of individual species and there growth patterns. Experience has taught us that certain trees react in different ways to pruning and at different times of year. There is debate at which time may be the best but it is generally thought with deciduous trees may be after the first flush of growth or late season growth. Pruning in winter just after the coldest months will provide profuse growth when the tree comes back into leaf. Autumn may be the least desirable time.</p><p>Australian Natives and evergreens should be pruned after extension growth has finished in the summer months and as a general rule not too heavy. Pruning some natives in the winter months can take them longer to seal and repair the cut. As a rule I have noticed it is better to make lots of small cuts than remove large limbs.</p><p><strong>Methods;</strong>&nbsp;used to carry out work, are climbing methods, EWP, ladders and step ladders. Extendable poles with attachments (saw or mechanical pruners), motorised pole saw, hand saws and secateurs.</p><p><strong>Reasons;&nbsp;</strong>for shaping and pruning could be to encourage better form &amp; structure in early stages of growth, light penetration for fruiting, encouraging to grow in certain ways, pruning to avoid conflict with service lines or building lines or to limit pest and disease.&nbsp;</p><p>When thinning the crown of a tree we are sensitive to the species as each tree will react in different way according to how and when it is pruned. There is and art to performing this type of work that only a trained and experienced person will know. At Canopy Tree PL we not only know the wright methods for thinning but have a vast knowledge and experience spanning over two decades.</p><p>Shaping of Small Trees is carried out on young newly planted trees, small ornamental trees, small street trees, trees under service lines or power lines. These are some of the many pruning tasks we are asked to carry out at Canopy Tree for our clients.</p><p>Removing dead and dying branches from the tree whether in the crown or on the main stem of the tree. Experience has taught us that certain trees react in different ways to pruning and at different times of year. There is debate at which time may be the best but it is generally thought with deciduous trees may be after the first flush of growth or late season growth. Pruning in winter just after the coldest months will provide profuse growth when the tree comes back into leaf. Autumn may be the least desirable time.</p><p>Australian Natives and evergreens should be pruned after extension growth has finished in the summer months and as a general rule not too heavy. UPDATE wp_posts SET post_content = "<p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><img class=\"alignleft size-large wp-image-1424\" src=\"http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/Stump-Grinding-768x1024.jpg\" alt=\"Stump Grinding\" width=\"768\" height=\"1024\"></p><h3 class=\"widget-title\">Stump Removal</h3><p>The process where by a stump is removed to below ground level or completely removed from the ground. Canopy Tree has the ability to remove stumps of all sizes in all access situations. Give us a call today for a free estimate over the phone or via email, with no obligation. A description of site access and pictures of access and stump when sending an email will be required so we can give you estimate over the phone?</p><p><strong>Methods;</strong> used to remove stumps can range from digging out a small stump with a mattock and spade, grinding with a stump grinding machine to using excavators to dig out large stumps. Mostly in gardens one would use a stump grinder as it provides a mechanical advantage, which is quick and less demanding on the operator. There are different size stump grinders that will suit different size stumps and access to the stump.</p>Stumps are hard to remove by hand an often need to be ground out with a stump grinding machine. The machine has a circular blade with tungsten tip cutting teeth that slews side to side taking small bits out of the stump with every pass.&nbsp;All types and size tree stumps (up to 10m diameter),can be removed, including stumps in areas difficult to access.&nbsp;On most occasions, the stump is ground out completely up to 2ft deep allowing replanting afterwards. Sometimes if there are underground utilities, only the stump surface can be removed to avoid damage to underground services.", guid = "http://localhost:8888/ROC-Client-System-Generator/website/" WHERE ID = "1450"

Trees will show many different signs indicating good vigour as they grow and mature, they are self-optimising structures that will change over many years of growth to maturity and in some cases not only over years but decades and centuries. To the trained eye these will be more obvious and at Canopy Tree we are continually learning tree signs that indicate vigour, growth, stress and structural change. If you have concerns about your tree asset and its condition, please call us today for a consultation. We will provide you with an estimate for an onsite assessment and consultation based on current hourly rates including travel. If further investigation report writing or use of outside expert will be needed you will be advised during the onsite consultation.&nbsp;</p><p>Trees suffer from a variety of pest and diseases, some may be specific to a certain species others may be more general covering a variety of trees. Biotic (Living) disease; such as scale, Boring insects, fungi and bacterial infections. Abiotic (Nonliving) disease; drought, mechanical damage (e.g. from construction), or even herbicide drift.
